name: kaspian-roulette
description: Kaspa Russian Roulette - A crypto game on Kaspa Network

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix shared
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
